data.trans: Theo kịp với, cập nhật với
data.trans_hint: Một công ty thành công phải theo kịp tốc độ thay đổi công nghệ.
data.en_hint: A successful company must keep up with the pace of technological change.
data.content_game_1: A successful company must keep up with the pace of technological change.
data.answer_en_hint: A successful company must keep up with the pace of technological change.

data.trans: Chia tay, kết thúc, tan vỡ
data.trans_hint: Mối quan hệ của họ đã kết thúc.
data.content_game_1: Their relationship has broken up.
data.answer_en_hint: Their relationship has broken up.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đã ốm hai tuần lễ và bây giờ tôi phải làm bù để bắt kịp công việc tôi đã lỡ.
data.en_hint: I was ill for a fortnight and now I've got to catch up on the work I missed.
data.content_game_1: I was ill for a fortnight and now I've got to catch up on the work I missed.
data.answer_en_hint: I was ill for a fortnight and now I've got to catch up on the work I missed.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy ngủ gật trong suốt bài giảng.
data.en_hint: He was dozing off during the lesson.
data.content_game_1: He was dozing off during the lesson.
data.answer_en_hint: He was dozing off during the lesson.

data.trans_hint: Ở trường, tôi luôn luôn học kém môn Vật lý. Tôi không thể hiểu những cái thuyết đó.
data.en_hint: At school, I always did badly at physics. I can't make sense all of those theories.
data.content_game_1: At school, I always did badly at physics. I can't make sense all of those theories.
data.answer_en_hint: At school, I always did badly at physics. I can't make sense all of those theories.

data.trans_hint: Chúng phải làm bài tập về nhà, nếu không thì bố mẹ của chúng sẽ mắng chúng.
data.en_hint: They have to do homework, otherwise their parents would give them a telling-off.
data.content_game_1: They have to do homework, otherwise their parents would give them a telling-off.
data.answer_en_hint: They have to do homework, otherwise their parents would give them a telling-off.

data.trans: Giữ ai ở lại, cấm túc (như một hình phạt)
data.trans_hint: Một ngày nọ, em gái tôi đã bị giữ lại sau giờ học bởi vì nó không hoàn thành bài tập mà nó phải làm.
data.en_hint: The other day my sister was kept in after school because she didn't finish the task she was supposed to do.
data.content_game_1: The other day my sister was kept in after school because she didn't finish the task she was supposed to do.
data.answer_en_hint: The other day my sister was kept in after school because she didn't finish the task she was supposed to do.

data.trans: Trừ điểm (của bài thi, bài luận,...)
data.trans_hint: Khi bạn viết một bài luận, hãy chú ý đến lỗi chính tả và dấu câu vì giáo viên có thể sẽ hạ điểm vì những lỗi đó.
data.en_hint: When you write an essay, pay extra attention to spelling and punctuation mistakes because the teacher can mark you down for them.
data.content_game_1: When you write an essay, pay extra attention to spelling and punctuation mistakes because the teacher can mark you down for them.
data.answer_en_hint: When you write an essay, pay extra attention to spelling and punctuation mistakes because the teacher can mark you down for them.

data.trans_hint: Nếu bạn muốn vào đại học, bạn phải cố gắng hơn nữa và bắt tay vào làm hồ sơ xin học.
data.en_hint: If you want to get into university, you have to pull your socks up and start to work on your application.
data.content_game_1: If you want to get into university, you have to pull your socks up and start to work on your application.
data.answer_en_hint: If you want to get into university, you have to pull your socks up and start to work on your application.

data.trans_hint: Tôi cảm thấy rất hoài niệm mỗi khi tôi hồi tưởng lại quãng thời gian học đại học.
data.en_hint: I feel very nostalgic whenever I think back to the time in university.
data.content_game_1: I feel very nostalgic whenever I think back to the time in university.
data.answer_en_hint: I feel very nostalgic whenever I think back to the time in university.

data.trans: Buộc ai đó phải rời đi
data.trans_hint: Em trai tôi hành xử cực kỳ tệ ở trên lớp đến mức bị đuổi ra ngoài.
data.en_hint: My brother behaved so badly in the class that he was thrown out.
data.content_game_1: My brother behaved so badly in the class that he was thrown out.
data.answer_en_hint: My brother behaved so badly in the class that he was thrown out.
